amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to initiate or decline a Federal criminal charge based on impermissible considerations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1623 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 80.

action.text: Amendment SA 1623 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S2324-2325) To prohibit the use of funds to initiate or decline a Federal criminal charge based on impermissible considerations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1623 proposed by Senator Lee.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1623 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 80.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1623 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 80.
